name: Foil CYM
description:
Foil CYM is a back-to-the-basics score attack that can be learned in a flash but that will take a long while to truly master.

-Local and online high score boards

-10 maps

-8 modes

-Unending difficulty levels

-Controller, keyboard and/or mouse, with re-bindable keys in all cases to suit you gaming style

-Great 8-bit soundtrack

-Deterministic gameplay and levels that leave improvement in your hands, not chance

Please help us succeed on Greenlight as well!
